description: Shared Service Canada procure the replacement of an uninterruptible Power Supply (UPS) At 800 Burrard
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Solicitation for the Replacement of UPS at 800 Burrard Street

Shared Services Canada (SSC) invites bids from qualified suppliers for the supply and delivery of Uninterruptible Power Supply (UPS) systems to replace existing equipment at 800 Burrard Street.

### Tender Details

* **Reference Number:** SSC-23-00023772:T
* **Amendment Number:** 1
* **Solicitation Number:** BPM019522/23772
* **Publication Date:** September 8, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** September 27, 2023, at 14:00 hours
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** None
* **Expected Contract End Date:** None
* **Contracting Entity:** Shared Services Canada
* **Contracting Entity Address:** 90 Metcalfe Street, Ottawa, Ontario, K0A 0C3, Canada

### Procurement Information

* **Procurement Category:** Goods and Services
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open bidding
* **Trade Agreements:** CETA, WTO GPA, CFTA, CPTPP

### Contact Information:

* **Contact Name:** Raiyane Benchekroun
* **Contact Email:** raiyane.benchekroun@ssc-spc.gc.ca
* **Contact Phone:** (613) 324 4061
* **Contact Fax:** (613) 960-6007

### Tender Documents

* Please access the tender documents at the following URLs:
	+ https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/C65A2A95-AC6E-4802-A4C8-2EC1A927222E
	+ https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/5BD38C29-6E05-4FE8-AE24-FE9E2837F5B1

	+ https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/B133BF71-72D5-4371-8D1D-F80881EE77A7

Please direct any questions or inquiries to the contact
